snippet: The Composer Portrait series at the Miller Theater continued with a tribute to the award-winning South Korean classicist Unsuk Chin.
abstract: Corinna da Fonseca-Wollheim reviews performance by musician and composer Unsuk Chin at Columbia University's Miller Theater.
lead_paragraph: The Composer Portrait series at the Miller Theater continued with a tribute to the award-winning South Korean classicist Unsuk Chin.

headline.seo: Unsuk Chin Celebrated in Composer Portrait at Miller Theater
